isTablet

public static boolean isTablet(Context context)
Uses the device's screen size to determine if the current device is a tablet or is tablet-sized.

Parameters:
context - required to provide access to the device configuration information
Returns:
true if the device has a large enough screen to be considered a tablet (for UI purposes).

getScreenSize

Places the x and y pixel dimensions of the screen into the given int[].

Parameters:

formatStackTrace

public static java.lang.String formatStackTrace(java.lang.StackTraceElement element)
Formats a stack trace into a single line that provides relevant information for debugging

Parameters:
element - the element to format
Returns:
a well-formatted stack-trace line containing the class name, method name, and line number that, when clicked in the logcat, will display the line or source from where the message originated.
